multiplechoiceresponse.p:
In the Data Visualizer app, select a visualization that will allow you to compare data across locations (i.e. sizes of related elements). Use the following information to build the visualization:
Data: “EPI - DPT-HepB-HIB 1 doses given”, “EPI - DPT-HepB-HIB 2 doses given” and “EPI - DPT-HepB-HIB 3 doses given” (be sure to select the data elements, not the indicators).
Period: January - December 2021.
Organisation unit: Districts in Food Region.

label.h3: Which data element had the highest number of doses given in June 2021?

div.p: In this example, the data element “EPI - DPT-HepB-HIB 2 doses given” had the highest number of doses given in June 2021.
